Controller Inheritance

Controllers can be inherited/derived by other controllers, where the properties of base controller are inherited/derived by child controllers.

Inheritance (base-child controllers)

Controllers can be inherited by other controllers, which allows a base-child controller relationship. If you want to have authorization enabled for few controllers, this is how you do it
